title: Giusto Priola
text:
Giusto Priola (born 26 May 1990) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="A.S.D.%20Giarre%20Calcio%201946">Giarre</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Serie%20C">Serie C</a> debut for <a href="Trapani%20Calcio">Trapani</a> on 4 September 2011 in a game against <a href="A.C.%20Prato">Prato</a>.
On 10 October 2019 he signed with <a href="AZ%20Picerno">Picerno</a>.
On 7 August 2021 he joined <a href="A.S.D.%20Giarre%20Calcio%201946">Giarre</a> in <a href="Serie%20D">Serie D</a>.
